definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: Levitical city in mountain-country of Judah, south of Hebron, mod. Semû‘ₐ v. Rob:BR i. 464, ii. 204 Survey:iii. 403 Bd:Pal. 153; 1Ch 4:17, 1Ch 4:19 it appears as

definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: of a man of Judah. (On the form, cf. sub [[אֶשְׁתָּאוֹל]].)
